sys_update_xml.payload:
restrictedtruefalseon_desktopfalse2809952237b1300054b6a3549dbe5dd40false1970-01-03 00:00:00OPEXUS (formally AINS) REDACTXpress is a redaction and declassification software tool used to permanently remove sensitive information from electronic documents. RedactXpress completely and securely removes information selected for redaction. Using pixel-to-pixel replacement, RedactXpress parses the document, physically deletes the selected information, and generates an entirely new “clean redacted” document — ready for distribution.

NOTE: REDACTXpress is available for JWICS Only

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="OPEXUS REDACTXpress">5be470d929d521109e88a714779a09c5</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:aefc70d5291921109e88a714779a09b7</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Update Device Name on User Change</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    function processUserInfo(serverResponse) {
        var value = serverResponse.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
        if (value && value !== '') {
            g_form.setValue('device_name', value);
        } else {
            g_form.setValue('device_name', '');
        }
    }
    var ga = new GlideAjax('global.SAMPVirutalAgentCatalogUtil');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'defaultValueForDevice');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_id', newValue);
    ga.getXML(processUserInfo);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>matthew.wise</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-02-27 17:52:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>82180d95295921109e88a714779a097f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Device Name on User Change</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BSC NRS Global - Software" source="38bbe8f2c11c1110e3356eee3a72a41e">38bbe8f2c11c1110e3356eee3a72a41e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BSC NRS Global - Software">38bbe8f2c11c1110e3356eee3a72a41e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_82180d95295921109e88a714779a097f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matthew.wise</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-02-27 17:52:24</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
    g_form.setValue('u_business_phone', '');
    g_form.setValue('u_manager', '');
    g_form.setValue('u_email', '');
    g_form.setValue('u_department', '');
    g_form.setValue('u_select_manager', false);
    g_form.setValue('u_service_location', '');

    var user = g_form.getReference('requested_for_user', callBack);

    function callBack(user) {
        g_form.setValue('u_business_phone', user.phone);
        g_form.setValue('u_manager', user.manager);

        //DIA-4583 - Allow requester to choose manager if user account does not have a manager already listed.
        if (user.manager != '') g_form.setReadOnly('u_manager', true);
        else g_form.setReadOnly('u_manager', false);

        g_form.setValue('u_email', user.email);
        g_form.setValue('u_service_location', user.location);
        g_form.setValue('u_department', user.department);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>matthew.wise</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-02-27 17:51:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e1d78955295921109e88a714779a091d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onChange requested_for_user </sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BSC NRS Global - Software" source="38bbe8f2c11c1110e3356eee3a72a41e">38bbe8f2c11c1110e3356eee3a72a41e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BSC NRS Global - Software">38bbe8f2c11c1110e3356eee3a72a41e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e1d78955295921109e88a714779a091d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matthew.wise</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-02-27 17:51:06</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
